questions.topic: What wrong with firebase and ember?
questions.author: student77
questions.note: Can't connect to firebase database when using ember2

questions.author: Picasso
questions.note: My app require api key but I don't know what it is.
questions.answer: An API specifies how software components should interact

answers.answer: Application program interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications. An API specifies how software components should interact and APIs are used when programming graphical user interface (GUI) components.
answers.author: apiExpert
